com.tapsterrock.mpx
Class Relation

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.tapsterrock.mpx.Relation
public class Relation
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the relationship between two tasks. These relationships normally found in the lists of predecessors and successors associated with a task record in an MPX file.

Field Summary

          Constant representing a finish-finish relationship.

          Constant representing a finish-start relationship.
